entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You were investigating a ryll smuggling ring when Lt. Cope interrupted and pulled you off of the case. You had traced the smugglers to their refining bunker, but had not yet identified whoever was controlling the operation.
entries.journal_entry_description: Someone is smuggling a highly addictive spice known as ryll into Kor Vella. Find the source of the spice.
entries.journal_entry_title: CorSec Case Files: Ryll Smuggling Ring
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Menchi Lerann is a known ryll addict. Speak with him and find out where he buys his ryll.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Menchi gives you the name Vuul Sarlin as his ryll seller, but also warns that Vuul is not easy to find. He suggested starting with one of Vuul's henchmen, Jaylon Geissler.
entries.task02_item_name: You destroyed a case of ryll
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Jaylon Geissler refused to speak with you. Maybe he'll loosen his tongue if you destroy some of his supply of ryll, which will have the added bonus of getting that ryll off of the streets.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Destroy the Ryll in the Warehouse
entries.task03_comm_message_text: Okay, okay. Now that you've destroyed all that ryll, I guess I tell you where he is. It's not like he won't already be fuming. Vuul has a camp outside of town. You'll find him there.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Comm. from Jaylon Geissler: "Okay, okay. Now that you've destroyed all that ryll, I guess I tell you where he is. It's not like he won't already be fuming. Vuul has a camp outside of town. You'll find him there."
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Before speaking with Vuul Sarlin, you'll need to make sure his guards behave themselves.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Rough Up some of Vuul's Guards
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Now that you have his complete attention, speak with Vuul Sarlin and find out who is supplying the ryll he sells.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Vuul could only provide you with the location of the bunker where the ryll is refined and where he gets his supply of ryll. The name of his contact is Ladonna Poe, and she is always outside of the bunker when dealing with sellers. No one is allowed inside as far as Vuul knows. Defeat Ladonna Poe and take her access card to get into the bunker.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Use Ladonna Poe's access card to enter the bunker. Search the bunker's mainframe to find out who is behind the smuggling operation. Also, destroy any unrefined ryll you find and reduce the number of smugglers.
entries.task07_task_display_string_1: Reduce the Number of Smugglers in the Bunker
entries.task07_task_display_string_2: Use the bunker's mainframe to find out who is controlling the smuggling ring.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: Something terrible has happened. Leave off your investigation and report to me at once!
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: A comm. message from Lt. Cope: "Something terrible has happened. Leave off your investigation and report to me at once!"
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Lt. Cope has interrupted your investigation of the ryll smugglers with an urgent request that you speak with him.
entries.task10_item_name: You destroyed a crate of unrefined ryll
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Destroy any unrefined ryll you find.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You notice something of interest on the crates of unrefined ryll. Each an every one is marked in the same way: with a single red circle.
entries.task11_message_box_text: You notice something of interest on the crates of unrefined ryll. Each an every one is marked in the same way: with a single red circle.
entries.task12_item_name: You have accessed the ryll smuggler's mainframe
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Access the bunker's mainframe and find out who is controlling the smuggling ring.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: You find nothing useful on the mainframe. Not even a single clue as to who might be running the smuggling ring.
entries.task13_message_box_text: You find nothing useful on the mainframe. Not even a single clue as to who might be running the smuggling ring.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: Reduce the number of smugglers working in the ryll refinement bunker.
